name: Glommyvania
description:
Glommyvania - 

Casltevania , Metroidvania -like game.

Android version:

Keyboard Control:

WASD  = movement W Key = Jump
A Key = Left walk
D Key = Right walk
S Key = ENTER / Save Game(Near Statue)
L Key = Attack
K Key = Super Attack
F Key = How to play
P Key = Pause Game
R Key = back to menu when pause the game

Credits:

Music:

- Theme Song [8-bit] by Nene
- Shop Music by Cleyton Kauffman
- Spooky Dungeon by Memoraphile @ You're Perfect Studio
- 8-bit-theme-intensity by Ted Kerr2018
- 8-bit-battle-theme-famitracker by celestialghost
- Title Theme by Marllon Silva (xDeviruchi)
- Decisive Battle by Marllon Silva (xDeviruchi)
- NES SFX Pack by Programancer

Graphic:

- Title BG By Ansimuz
- TileMap and Enemies By Anokolisa
- TileMap @cyangmou
- OpenGameArt
- Main character CG by @choihunghk

Made with Phaser 3
